coreAttributes.name: Wolf Whiskey
coreAttributes.description: Filled with a highly alcoholic whiskey, this glass bottle has a label on the front which depicts a greater wolf-boy having sex with a trio of lesser wolf-girls. A slogan written above this reads: 'Wolf Whiskey; For a real alpha!'
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.4)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the cap from the bottle of Wolf Whiskey, before tilting [npc.her] head back and bringing it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. A thick, musky scent rises from the opening, and with a gulp, [npc.name] [npc.verb(start)] downing the liquid, discovering that its taste is almost identical to its pungent aroma.
